name: Vertigo (itch) (VesperDuck)
description:
Developed for the Epic Megajam 2022 by the Data7 Studios team. 

Existing assets used:

- Directional Planetary Gravity plugin for player gravity

- AutoSettings plugin for settings

- Sliding sound and air whooshing sound for vault doors and player changing gravity from WeLoveIndies

- Vault door model from KIT OPS

All other code, assets and music are original.
